parameters.label: organization-defined audit logging failure events requiring real-time alerts

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Provide an alert within {{ au-5.2_prm_1 }} to {{ au-5.2_prm_2 }} when the following audit failure events occur: {{ au-5.2_prm_3 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Alerts provide organizations with urgent messages. Real-time alerts provide these messages at information technology speed (i.e., the time from event detection to alert occurs in seconds or less).
